title: Bernard the polar bear!
description:
Bernard is a French, animated TV show, centered on the fictional polar bear, Bernard made by the Korean company RG Animation Studios. The video clips are focusing on the bear&#039;s curiosity and have many moments of slapstick. Bernard never actually says anything legible. He is also completely alone except for one short, where he makes contact with several aliens.


3 minutes segments. No shortage of Laughs!
